verbs.description: [ARG0: John Legend] [V: took] [ARG1: to Twitter] [ARGM-PRP: to weigh in on Kanye West 's recent pro - Trump tweetstorm] . People think that Legend had the perfect response to the controversy .
[ARG0: John Legend] took to Twitter to [V: weigh] in [ARG1: on Kanye West 's recent pro - Trump tweetstorm] . People think that Legend had the perfect response to the controversy .
John Legend took to Twitter to weigh in on Kanye West 's recent pro - Trump tweetstorm . [ARG0: People] [V: think] [ARG1: that Legend had the perfect response to the controversy] .
John Legend took to Twitter to weigh in on Kanye West 's recent pro - Trump tweetstorm . People think that [ARG0: Legend] [V: had] [ARG1: the perfect response to the controversy] .
